body: node cache hit rate is close to zero, much lower than node caching was initially introduced.
author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
title: MCTS AI not able to reuse search tree from earlier invocation

comments.body: bug is due to getting node from cache before hidding hidden cards, while nodes added to the cache had hidden cards. **Summary:** MCTS AI not able to reuse search tree from earlier invocation (was: MTCS AI not able to reuse search tree from earlier invocation) **Status:** Started
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

content:
_From [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/) on March 19, 2014 17:07:33_

node cache hit rate is close to zero, much lower than node caching was initially introduced.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=530_
